content: If the installed version is older (i.e. it is Java 1.3.1 or Java 1.4.2 and you wish to use the more recent Java 5 release), you should proceed below with downloading and installing a JDK.
stemmed: If instal version older ( i.e . java 1.3.1 java 1.4.2 wish use recent java 5 releas ) , proceed download instal jdk .
